ModMetaData.name: TwitchToolkit - More !mypawn Commands
ModMetaData.author: Heremeus
ModMetaData.description:
Adds new commands for your viewers. No more "Can you show my health tab please?", "What weapon do I have?" and so on.
Commands: !mypawngear - Shows all weapons and apparel equipped by a pawn (simple side-arms is currently not supported) !mypawnhealth - Shows a pawn health summary and queued surgeries !mypawnhealth [capacity] - e.g. "!mypawnhealth blood pump" will show details for a pawns blood pumping !mypawnbody - Shows the status of each body part
